name: Focused Caster
desc:
If unit has not moved, grants an effect depending on magic type used:
Anima - Range+1 / Light - Crit+30 / Dark - ATK+5.
components: 1 if unit.get_weapon() and item_system.weapon_type(unit, item) == 'Anima' else 0
30 if unit.get_weapon() and item_system.weapon_type(unit, item) == 'Light' else 0
5 if unit.get_weapon() and item_system.weapon_type(unit, item) == 'Dark' else 0
